name: tools

name: scan to PDF (in progress)
description: A simple web app to scan documents using your device's camera and convert them into PDF files.

name: CV generator (in progress)
description: A web app to create and customize professional CVs with ease, using pre-designed templates and a user-friendly interface.

name: blog (soon)
description: A personal blog sharing insights, tutorials, and experiences in web development and design.
